descript.abstract: A line feature class of Miami-Dade County streets with seamless address ranges. This feature class (FC) is one of a set of FC's derived from our main Streets FC, which were created to display street information.CLASS -- ROAD TYPE -- DEFINITION==================================0 -- Expressway Ramp -- Access ramps to expressways only1 -- Expressway -- Limited access roadways2 -- Highway -- Non-Limited access highways examples: US 1, KROME AVE3 -- Major Road -- Major roads that serve a large volume of traffic4 -- Feeder Road -- Roads that connect major roads and minor roads5 -- Minor Road -- Any other road recognized as a street6 -- Alley -- Roads serving as secondary means of vehicular access7 -- Non Paved -- Dirt roads, farm or maintenance8 -- Driveway, Accessway9 -- New Subdivision -- New subdivision - planned roadwayUpdated: Weekly-Sat The data was created using: Projected Coordinate System: WGS_1984_Web_Mercator_Auxiliary_SphereProjection: Mercator_Auxiliary_Sphere
descript.purpose: A line feature class of Miami-Dade County streets with seamless address ranges.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Old Street unique indentifier used on the legacy coverage format.
Start of the left address range.
End of the left address range.
Start of the right address range.
End of the right address range.
Lengh of the street arc, or -1 if traffic is not allowed going form the begining of the arc to the end as it was digitized.
Lengh of the street arc, or -1 if traffic is not allowed going form the end of the arc to the beginning as it was digitized.
Complete Street Name = PRE_DIR + ST_NAME + ST_TYPE + SUF_DIR

overview.eaover:
Below is a list for the attributes tha can be found in all of our Street's derivative producs, with a description, and a list of the products (FeatureClasses) where the specific street attribute can be found: GeoStreets --> An Arc FeatureClass of Miami-Dade County streets with seamless address ranges. GeoActualRanges --> An Arc FeatureClass of Miami-Dade County treets with actual address ranges. St_Dade --> An Arc FeatureClass of Miami-Dade County treets in a Coverage Structure. GeoIntersection --> A Point FeatureClass of Miami-Dade County streets' intersections. CartoStreets --> A Polygon FreatureClass Miami-Dade County street created from the street base layer using a process called "buffer". It was designed for cartographic display purposes and does not have attributes.
STREETID FeatureClasses containing this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade, StreetMaint Field Description: Street unique indentifier.
STREETID_ID_OLD FeatureClasses using this Field:GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade Field Description: Street unique indentifier used on the legacy coverage format.
L_ADD_FROM FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade Field Description: Start of the left address range.
L_ADD_TO FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade Field Description: End of the left address range.
R_ADD_FROM FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade Field Description: Start of the right address range.
R_ADD_TO FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade Field Description: End of the right address range.
PRE_DIR FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade Field Description: Street direction prefix (N, S, E, W, NE, NW, SE, SW).
ST_NAME FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade Field Description: Street name --> If the street name only contains one type this attribute contains only the name of the street. If the street name contains dual street types this attribute contains the name and the first type un-abbreviated.
ST_TYPE FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade Field Description: Street Type --> If the street name only contains one type this attribute contains the type abbreviation. If the street name contains dual street types this attribute contains the second type abbreviation.
SUF_DIR FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade Field Description: Street direction suffix (N, S, E, W, NE, NW, SE, SW).
SNAME FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade, StreetMaint Field Description: Complete Street Name = PRE_DIR + ST_NAME + ST_TYPE + SUF_DIR
LZIP FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade Field Description: Left zipcode depending on the direction the feature was digitized.
RZIP FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade Field Description: Right zipcode depending on the direction the feature was digitized.
LMUNIC FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade, StreetMaint Field Description: Left municipality depending on the direction the feature was digitized.
RMUNIC FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade, StreetMaint Field Description: Right municipality depending on the direction the feature was digitized.
FROM_TO_IMP FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade Field Description: Lengh of the street arc, or -1 if traffic is not allowed going form the begining of the arc to the end as it was digitized.
TO_FROM_IMP FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade Field Description: Lengh of the street arc, or -1 if traffic is not allowed going form the end of the arc to the beginning as it was digitized.
CLASS FeatureClasses using this Field: GeoStreets, GeoActualRanges, St_Dade, StreetMaint Field Description: Road Type Classification.
CLASS -- ROAD TYPE -- DEFINITION ================================== 0 -- Expressway Ramp -- Access ramps to expressways only 1 -- Expressway -- Limited access roadways 2 -- Highway -- Non-Limited access highways examples: US 1, KROME AVE 3 -- Major Road -- Major roads that serve a large volume of traffic 4 -- Feeder Road -- Roads that connect major roads and minor roads 5 -- Minor Road -- Any other road recognized as a street 6 -- Alley -- Roads serving as secondary means of vehicular acces 7 -- Non Paved -- Dirt roads, farm or maintenance 8 -- Driveway, Accessway 9 -- New Subdivision -- New subdivision - planned roadway
ONEWAY FeatureClasses using this Field: StreetMaint Field Description: Direction the traffic goes on the road.
ONEWAY -- DEFINITION ============================= B -- Both Directions FT -- From direction to the To direction TF -- To direction to the From direction
MAINTCODE FeatureClasses using this Field: StreetMaint Field Description: Who maintains the road.
MAINTCODE -- DEFINITION ============================= AP -- Airport/Port maintained CC -- County/City maintained CI -- City maintained CM -- County maintained within city CO -- County maintained PC -- Private City PR -- Private ROW County SR -- State maintained U -- Unknown UR -- Undeveloped ROW
F_ZLEV FeatureClasses using this Field: StreetMaint Field Description: Elevation from the beginning of the arc to the end, depending on the direction the arc was digitized.
F_ZLEV -- DEFINITION ============================= 0 -- Ground Level 1 -- Raised Elevation 2 -- Raised Elevation Level 2 3 -- Raised Elevation Level 3
T_ZLEV FeatureClasses using this Field: StreetMaint Field Description: Elevation from the end of the arc to the beginning, depending on the direction the arc was digitized.
T_ZLEV -- DEFINITION ============================= 0 -- Ground Level 1 -- Raised Elevation 2 -- Raised Elevation Level 2 3 -- Raised Elevation Level 3
SPEEDLIMIT FeatureClasses using this Field: StreetMaint Field Description: Speed Limit
LANES FeatureClasses using this Field: StreetMaint Field Description: Number of traffic lanes.
ST_WIDTH FeatureClasses using this Field: StreetMaint Field Description: This field specifies the width, in feet, of the buffer used to create the derivative product CartoStreets.

distinfo.distliab: See access and use constraints information.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
